= Installation Guide for Drupal Module =

Before installing Ezmath module, make sure you already install MathJax module.

== Installation and Setup ==
  # Go to your [http://www.mathjax.org/ MathJax] module folder. Open `mathjax.js` with text editor.
  # Search for the line that start with `'inlineMath:` and remove it.
  # Replace that line with `'inlineMath: [["\\\\(","\\\\)"]],' +`. This will allow you to save single Dollar sign ($) for text, not for MathJax.
  # Download and uncompress `ezmath.tar.gz` in side your modules folder, which default place is `/sites/all/modules`.
  # Enable `Ezmath filter` module under `Administer >> Site building >> Modules`.
  # Add Ezmath filter at `Administer >> Site configuration >> Input formats`.
  # Go to `Rearrange` tab and weight Ezmath to -1.
